lal20:7: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyaṁ pūrvasyāṁ diśi ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ sthitā abhūvan—mā bodhisattvasya kaścidantarāyaṁ kārṣīditi | evaṁ dakṣiṇapaścimottarā diśo devaiḥ parigṛhītā abhūvan ||
lal20:8: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇastasyāṁ velāyāṁ bodhisattvasaṁcodanīṁ nāma raśmiṁ prāmuñcat, yayā raśmyā samantāddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṁkhyeyāni dharmadhātuparamāṇyākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇyavabhāsitānyabhūvan ||
lal20:9: atha khalu pūrvasyāṁ diśi vimalāyāṁ lokadhātau vimalaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāllalitavyūho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṁskāramabhisamakarod yenaddharyabhisaṁskāreṇābhisaṁskṛtena daśasu dikṣvākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇyekaṁ maṇḍalamātramādarśayati sma śuddhasya nīlavaiḍūryasya | pañcagatyupapannānāṁ sarvasattvānāṁ purato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṁ bodhisattvamupadarśayati sma | te ca sattvāḥ parasparamekāṅgulikābhirbodhisattvamupadarśayanti sma—ko ’yamevaṁrūpaḥ sattvo lalitaḥ, ko ’yamevaṁrūpaḥ sattvo virājata iti | teṣāṁ ca sattvānāṁ purato bodhisattvo bodhisattvānnirmimīte sma | tatra te bodhisattvavigrahā imā gāthā abhāṣanta—
lal20:11: yasyā kiṁcana rāgadoṣakaluṣā sā vāsanā uddhṛtā
lal20:12: yasyā kāyaprabhākṛtā daśadiśe sarve prabhā niṣprabhāḥ |
lal20:17: atha khalu bhikṣavo dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi ratnavyūhāyā lokadhāto ratnārciṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnacchatrakūṭasaṁdarśano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe ekaratnachatreṇa taṁ sarvāvantaṁ maṇḍalamātraṁ saṁchādayati sma | tatra śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ parasparametadavocan—kasyedaṁ phalam, kenāyamevaṁrūpo ratnachatravyūhaḥ saṁdṛśyata iti | atha tasmādratnachatrādiyaṁ gāthā niścarati sma—
lal20:20: dattā apratimeṣu maitramanasā tiṣṭhanti ke nirvṛte |
lal20:25: atha khalu paścimāyā diśaścampakavarṇāyā lokadhātoḥ puṣpāvalivanarājikusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādindrajālī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopajagāma | upetya ca bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṁ maṇḍalamātramekaratnajālena saṁchādayati sma | tatra daśasu dikṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāḥ parasparamevamāhuḥ—kasyāyamevaṁrūpo prabhāvyūha iti | atha tasmādratnajālādiyaṁ gāthā niścarati sma—
lal20:27: ratnākaro ratanaketu ratistriloke ratnottamo ratanakīrti rataḥ sudharme |
lal20:28: ratnāni trīṇi na ca chetsyati vīryaprāptaḥ so bodhi prāpsyati varāmiya tasya pūjā ||
lal20:31: atha khalūttarasyāṁ diśi sūryāvartāyā lokadhātoścandrasūryajihmīkaraprabhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādvyūharājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāstān sarvāṁstasmin maṇḍalamātre saṁdarśayati sma | tatra kecidbodhisattvā evamāhuḥ—kasyema evaṁrūpā vyūhāḥ? atha tebhyaḥ sarvavyūhebhya iyaṁ gāthā niścarati sma—
lal20:33: kāyo yena viśodhitaḥ subahuśaḥ puṇyena jñānena ca
lal20:34: yenā vāca viśodhitā vratatapaiḥ satyena dharmeṇa ca |
lal20:35: cittaṁ yena viśodhitaṁ hiridhṛtī kāruṇyamaitryā tathā
lal20:39: atha khalu pūrvadakṣiṇasyā diśo guṇākarāyā lokadhātorguṇarājaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādruṇamatirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvaguṇavyūhaṁ kūṭāgāraṁ tasmin maṇḍalamātre ’bhinirmimīte sma | tasya te parivārā evamāhuḥ—kasyāyamevaṁrūpaḥ kūṭāgāravyūhaḥ? tataśca kūṭāgārādiyaṁ gāthā niścarati sma—
lal20:41: yasya guṇaiḥ satataṁ guṇagandhikā bhonti surāsura yakṣa mahoragāḥ |
lal20:42: so guṇavān guṇarājakulodito bodhiviṭape upaviṣṭu guṇodadhiḥ ||
lal20:45: atha khalu dakṣiṇapaścimāyā diśo ratnasaṁbhavāyā lokadhāto ratnayaṣṭestathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnasaṁbhavo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe aprameyāsaṁkhyeyān ratnavyomakāṁstasminmaṇḍalamātre ’bhinirmimīte sma | tebhyaśca ratnavyomakebhya iyaṁ gāthā niścacāra—
lal20:49: vyomālaṁkṛta puṣpadāma rucirā udyāna kūpā sabhā
lal20:50: hastā pāda śirottamāṅganayanāḥ so bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ ||
lal20:53: atha khalu paścimottarasyā diśo meghavatyā lokadhātormegharājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrānmeghakūṭābhigarjitasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe kālānusāryagurumeghamabhinirmāyoragasāracandanacūrṇavarṣaṁ tasmin maṇḍalamātre ’bhipravarṣati sma | tasmācca kālānusārimeghamaṇḍalamātrādiyaṁ gāthā niścarati sma—
lal20:56: saddharmaṁ ca virāga varṣiṁ amṛtaṁ nirvāṇasaṁprāpakam |
lal20:61: atha khalūttarapūrvasyā diśo hemajālapratichannāyā lokadhāto ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāddhemajālālaṁkṛto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayāprabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣu ratnavyomakeṣu dvātriṁśallakṣaṇasamalaṁkṛtān bodhisattvavigrahānabhinirmimīte sma | sarve ca te bodhisattvavigrahā divyamānuṣyakapuṣpadāmaparigṛhītā yena bodhisattvastenābhinatakāyāstāni puṣpadāmānyabhipralambayanti sma | te imāṁ gāthāmabhāṣanta—
lal20:63: yena buddhanayutā stavita pūrva gauraveṇa mahatā janiya śraddhām |
lal20:67: atha khalvadhastāddiśaḥ samantavilokitāyā lokadhātoḥ samantadarśinastathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnagarbho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tasmin vaidūryamayamaṇḍalamātre jāmbūnadasuvarṇapadmānyabhyudgatānyupadarśayati sma | teṣāṁ ca padmānāṁ karṇikāsvardhakāyikā nāryo varṇarūpasaṁpannāḥ sarvālaṁkārapratimaṇḍitā upadarśayati sma | vāmadakṣiṇe pāṇibhirharṣakaṭakakeyūrasuvarṇasūtramuktāhārādivividhābharaṇaparigṛhītāḥ puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni cābhipralambayantyo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenoparyabhinatakāyāḥ | tāścemāṁ gāthāmabhāṣanta—
lal20:70: nirmāṇasuśīla sadojju praṣṭho tasyā onamathā guṇadharasya ||
lal20:73: atha khalūpariṣṭāddiśo varagaganāyā lokadhātorgaṇendrasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādgaganagañjo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṁcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe gaganatalastha eva yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvadṛṣṭāśrutapūrvāḥ santi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaravastrālaṁkārachatradhvajapatākāvaijayantiratn—amaṇikanakarajatamuktāhārahayagajarathapattivāhanapuṣpavṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphaladārakadārikā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālamānuṣyāmānuṣyāṇāṁ sarvā gaganatalānmahāntaṁ puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣanti sma sarvasattvaprītisukhasaṁjananaṁ ca | na ca kasyacitsattvasya bhayaṁ cotpīḍāṁ vā karoti sma ||
lal20:76: peyālameṣa diśatāsu jinaurasā ye saṁpūjituṁ hitakaraṁ anuprāpta bodhim |
lal20:78: ke cāgatā nabhasi megha iva stananto hārā sahasranayutāni pralambayantaḥ |
lal20:79: ke cāgatā makuṭaratnavilambacūḍāḥ pauṣpaṁ vimāna gagane upadarśayantaḥ ||
lal20:80: ke cāgatā dharaṇisiṁha ivā nadantaḥ śūnyānimittapraṇidhīravamuñcamānāḥ |
lal20:81: ke cāgatā yatha vṛṣā abhinandamānāḥ na ca dṛṣṭapūrva rucirāṇi kṣipanti puṣpāṁ ||
lal20:82: ke cāgatā nabhasi sāra ivā ravanto varṇāsahasra svaki ātmani darśayantaḥ |
lal20:83: ke cāgatā śaśirivā gagane supūrṇāḥ sugatātmajasya guṇamālamudīrayantaḥ ||
lal20:84: ke cāgatā raviriva prabha muñcamānāḥ sarvāṇi mārabhavanāni karonti jihmā |
lal20:85: ke cāgatā vimalaketu yathendrayaṣṭyaḥ saṁbhārapuṇyanicitāstahi bodhimaṇḍe ||
lal20:86: kecitkṣipanti gaganānmaṇiratnajālā candrā sucandra tatha bāla virocamānā |
lal20:88: ke cāgatā dharaṇi kampayamāna padbhyāṁ saṁkampitā vasudha prītikarī janasya |
lal20:89: ke cāgatā grahiya meru karetalebhiḥ utsṛṣṭapuṣpapuṭa saṁsthita antarīkṣe ||
lal20:90: ke cāgatāścaturi sāgara gṛhya mūrdhnā utsṛṣṭa siñci vasudhāṁ varagandhatoyaiḥ |
lal20:91: ke cāgatā ratanayaṣṭi gṛhītva citraṁ saṁbodhisattvamupadarśaya sthitva dūre ||
lal20:92: ke cāgatā bhaviya brahma praśāntarūpāḥ śāntā praśāntamanasaḥ sthita dhyānadhyāyī |
lal20:93: romebhi teṣa svaru niścarate manojña maitrīupekṣakaruṇāmuditāpramāṇā ||
lal20:94: ke cāgatā maruta śakra ivā yathaiva devaiḥ sahasranayutaiśca purākṛtāste |
lal20:95: upagamya bodhivaṭu gṛhya kṛtāñjalībhiḥ śakrābhilagna maṇiratna kṣipanti citrā ||
lal20:96: ke cāgatāścatudiśā ca yathaiva pālā gandharvarākṣasaparīvṛta kinnarebhiḥ |
lal20:97: vidyutsphuṭānta kusumāni pravarṣamāṇāḥ gandharvakinnararūtena stuvanti vīram ||
lal20:98: ke cāgatāḥ kusumitāṁ pragṛhītva vṛkṣān saphalāṁ sapuṣpavaragandha pramuñcamānāṁ |
lal20:99: jāteṣu teṣu sthita buddha śuddhakāyāḥ avalambamāna pratimaṇḍi kṣipanti puṣpā ||
lal20:100: ke cāgatāḥ kusumitāḥ puḍinī gṛhītvā padmotpalaiḥ kusumitaistatha puṇḍarīkaiḥ |
lal20:101: dvātriṁśalakṣaṇadharāḥ sthita padmagarbhe staviṣṭa aliptamanasaṁ vidu bodhisattvam ||
lal20:102: ke cāgatā vipulakāya tatheva meru sthitvāntarīkṣa svakamātmanamutsṛjanti |
lal20:103: utsṛjyamātra bhaviyā navapuṣpadāmāḥ saṁchādayanti trisahasri jinasya kṣetram ||
lal20:104: ke cāgatā ubhayacakṣuṣi kalpadāhaṁ saṁdarśayanta vibhavaṁ tatha saṁbhavaṁ ca |
lal20:105: teṣāṁ śarīri bahudharmasukhā raṇanti tāṁ śrutva sattvanayutā prajahanti tṛṣṇām ||
lal20:107: kanyā yathaiva sualaṁkṛta citrahārāḥ prekṣanta yāṁ suragaṇā na labhanti tṛptim ||
lal20:108: ke cāgatā vajirakāya ivā abhedyāḥ heṣṭhā paskandhacaraṇaiḥ pratigrāhyamāṇāḥ |
lal20:109: ke cāgatā ravirivā śaśipūrṇavaktrāḥ jyotsnākarāḥ prabhakarā hatakleśadoṣāḥ ||
lal20:110: ke cāgatā ratanamaṇḍita ratnapāṇī saṁchādayitva bahukṣetrasahasrakoṭyaḥ |
lal20:111: varṣanti ratnavara puṣpa sugandhagandhā saṁtoṣaṇārthaṁ bahusattvahitaṁ sukhārtham ||
lal20:112: ke cāgatā mahati dhāraṇi ratnakośāḥ romebhi sūtranayutāni prabhāṣamāṇāḥ |
lal20:114: ke cāgatā grahiya bheri yathaiva meru ākoṭyamānu gagane sumanojñaghoṣām |
lal20:115: yasyā ravaṁ daśadiśe vraji kṣetrakoṭyā adyāvaboddhumamataṁ anubuddhi śāstā ||
